{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07688v1", "title": "Four-loop renormalization with a cutoff in a sextic model", "summary": "The quantum action for a three-dimensional real sextic model using the
background field method is considered. Four-loop renormalization of this model
is performed with a cutoff regularization in the coordinate representation. The
coefficients for the renormalization constants are found, the applicability of
the $\mathcal{R}$-operation within the proposed regularization is explicitly
demonstrated, and the absence of nonlocal contributions is proved.
Additionally, the explicit form of the singularities, power and logarithmic, as
well as their dependence on the deformation of the Green's function are
discussed.", "main_category": "hep-th", "categories": "hep-th,math-ph,math.MP", "published": "2025-04-10T12:16:46Z"}
